name: poolparty-verona-esn-trento
description: even"dear all, esn trento together with esn verona are happy to invite you to an incredible and really unique pool party!!!! dont miss the chance to relax and have fun together with more than 450 erasmus students coming from different italian cities. at 6 p.m. (dont be late!!!) the bus will leave from trento bringing all the participants to verona village where a real pool party will start. there you will meet our djs ready to make you dance to the rhythms of the best modern music, also there's an "all-you-can-eat" buffet (hot dogs, hamburgers, french fries and pizza), "all-you-can-drink" beer, 3 cocktails, solarium and a jacuzzi until midnight. some time later, just as in cinderella, after getting changed and ready in the changing rooms, we will move to the night-time part of the village, where we will have a private room just for us and our djs who will definitely make you party till the next morning. besides, there are 3 more discotheques within the building among which you can choose one you like best according to your personal music preferences (latin-american, brazilian dance xiqueira or commercial music). still we definitely recommend the party with our djs, so we can all have fun and one crazy party together
